item.title: Two women testified that Matt Gaetz paid them for sex, lawyer says
Trump tried to limit financial conflicts in 2016. This time could be different.
item.description: Trump will take office with extraordinary wealth at a time when the government’s ability to monitor his ethics is far weaker than in his first preside...

item.title: Who is Sean Duffy? Former lawmaker, reality TV star is Trump’s transport pick.
item.description: Duffy is married to fellow “Real World” alum Rachel Campos-Duffy. He has described them as the first reality TV couple in the United States.

item.title: Duffy as transportation secretary will be a key player in relationship between government and Elon Musk
Trump taps ex-congressman and Fox Business host Sean Duffy as transportation secretary
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.
